FuncDef:
The value-added-service bod portal-reserved command enables a device to reserve portal services when BOD services are deployed.
The undo value-added-service bod portal-reserved command disables a device from reserving portal services when BOD services are deployed.
By default, a device is disabled from reserving portal services when BOD services are deployed.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
You must run the value-added-service bod portal-reserved command to enable a device to reserve portal services when BOD services are deployed in either of the following scenarios:
Both BOD and portal services are required.Portal services have been deployed on a device in advance, but the user group to which a user belongs cannot match a redirection policy. BOD services must be deployed to modify the user's user-group attribute, activating portal services.

Precautions
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
